account.modules.info:
ScrumDesk Start! is an application which provides multiple modules supporting multiple aspects of agile development processes and practices.

Every module can be activated or deactivated according to your needs. Some of modules are available for free, while others can be bought for one-time payment. Module licenses are perpetual. You'll never be asked to pay again.

Activated modules provide theirs functionality to all account users.
account.module.scrum.name: Scrum
account.module.scrum.description:
Scrum module allows teams to manage theirs projects using Scrum framework.

  • Backlog management
  • Story templates
  • Releases and sprints planning
  • Capacity planners
  • Kanban boards
  • Definition of Done
  • Impediments tracking
  • Scrum reports
  • Export and import stories
account.module.retro.name: Retro
account.module.retro.description: Retrospective desk for onsite or distributed teams that provide an access to multiple retrospective techniques with team voting.
account.module.product_desk.name: ProductDesk
account.module.product_desk.description: ProductDesk is a place to design, plan and manage your products. User stories mapping, personas, value proposition canvases, business model canvases and roadmaps. Everything available in one package.
account.module.rca_desk.name: Root Causes Analysis Desk
account.module.rca_desk.description:
Do you need to understand how to break problem circles and cycles?

Analyze blockers slowing down your company. Identify root cause analysis and track progress of problem solution.
account.module.state.not_payed:
We have not recieved payment for this module.

For further usage please remit the invoice sent by email.
account.module.state.pending_pay:
ScrumDesk sales has been contacted. You will receive further information about the payment later via email.

Feel free to use the module meanwhile.
account.module.state.trial: Trial evaluation started on {{ trial_from | date:'dd.MM.yyyy' }} and will expire on {{ trial_to | date:'dd.MM.yyyy' }}.
account.module.state.trialed:
Trial expired on {{ trial_to | date:'dd.MM.yyyy' }}

For further usage please buy the module.
account.module.side.buy.admin: Contact your account administrator to buy this module.

notifications.center.title: Collaboration center
changes.center.title: Changes
guides.gotItHint: You can show this screen anytime by pressing "?" (on keyboard)
guides.projects.title: Projects Overview
guides.projects.body: Here you can create new projects and find the ones you are already involved in.
guides.projects.crutches.createNewProjec: You can add a new project by clicking here.
guides.projects.edit.profile.title: Project Settings
guides.projects.edit.profile.body: Set the basic project variables and manage your team.
guides.projects.edit.profile.crutches.te: Manage your team by clicking here
guides.desk.board.title: Product Desk Board
guides.desk.board.body: Here you can manage all the backlog items such as stories, bugs, tickets, etc. and display them in a way that makes sense to you.
guides.desk.board.crutches.addBacklogIte: Start with adding some backlog items.
guides.desk.board.crutches.goToPlan: Go to plan section after done with backlog generation.
guides.plan.title: Planning Board
guides.plan.body: Manage your iterations. Create releases and sprints, prioritize backlog items, estimate effort and break them down into tasks.
guides.plan.crutches.addRelease: Add a release by clicking here.
guides.plan.crutches.usePanes: Use panes to drag and drop backlog items between iterations.
guides.plan.crutches.goToWork: When done with planning, start a sprint and switch to Work view and get things done.
guides.plan.crutches.icebox: Icebox is a set of backlog items that aren't a part of any sprint.
guides.work.title: Task Board
guides.work.body: This board makes the progress on iteration backlog visible. Your team mates can update this board continuously by creating and joining tasks and moving them between workflow steps.
guides.work.crutches.wips: Set minimum and maximum work in progress limits by clicking here.
guides.work.crutches.addTask: Add new tasks by clicking the Add task button within the backlog items' swim lane.
guides.work.crutches.sprintDetails: Show sprint details by clicking anywhere on the board.
